generated_description: shishigin is a company based in sanda, hyogo prefecture, japan. it operates several restaurants under its two subsidiaries, shishigin and abacus. shishigin manages a chain of japanese cuisine restaurants, including "shishigin" in tono, "shishigin" in higashitane, and "shishigin" in ono. the company also operates "abacus" in higashitane and ono, which serves tonkatsu and italian cuisine. shishigin emphasizes using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, including rice and vegetables from its own fields. the company also offers dining experiences with traditional japanese pottery and seasonal italian dishes.
